movie.title: The Girl Next Door
movie.plot: Follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.

events.title: Gertrude Baniszewski locks Sylvia Likens in her basement
Sylvia Likens dies of her injuries
